mapper.select: select ssa.id ssa_id, ssa.spu_id ssa_spu_id, ssa.base_sale_attr_id ssa_base_sale_attr_id, ssa.sale_attr_name, ssav.* from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id and ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id where ssa.spu_id = #{spuId}

select ssa.id attr_id, ssav.*, IF(sku_sav.sale_attr_value_id is null, '0', '1') is_checked from spu_sale_attr_value ssav left join spu_sale_attr ssa on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id left join sku_sale_attr_value sku_sav on sku_sav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id and sku_sav.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and sku_sav.sku_id = #{skuId} where ssav.spu_id = #{spuId} order by ssav.id
SELECT group_concat(sale_attr_value_id SEPARATOR '|') value_id, sku_id FROM sku_sale_attr_value where spu_id = #{spuId} group by sku_id
